languages.text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} сначала исследовать место высадки самостоятельно, пообещав Идире взять ее с собой позже.

traits.locale_text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} сначала исследовать место высадки самостоятельно, пообещав Идире взять ее с собой позже.

languages.text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} сначала исследовать место высадки самостоятельно, пообещав Идире взять ее с собой позже.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.
The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.
The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.
The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de commencer par explorer le site d'atterrissage, en assurant à Idira qu'elle pourrait se joindre à {mf|lui|elle} le moment venu.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} a décidé de commencer par explorer le site d'atterrissage, en assurant à Idira qu'elle pourrait se joindre à {mf|lui|elle} le moment venu.

languages.text: 行商浪人决定先行前往登陆地点。{mf|他|她}向伊迪拉保证，说待时机成熟时，{mf|他|她}会带她一起去。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人决定先行前往登陆地点。{mf|他|她}向伊迪拉保证，说待时机成熟时，{mf|他|她}会带她一起去。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはまず着陸地点を探索することに決め、適切なタイミングで自らイディラを連れて行くと約束した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはまず着陸地点を探索することに決め、適切なタイミングで自らイディラを連れて行くと約束した。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat entschieden, zunächst den Landeplatz zu erkunden und Idira erst später mitzunehmen, zu gegebener Zeit.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat entschieden, zunächst den Landeplatz zu erkunden und Idira erst später mitzunehmen, zu gegebener Zeit.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido explorar la zona de aterrizaje en primer lugar y ha asegurado a Idira que la traerá cuando el momento sea adecuado.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha decidido explorar la zona de aterrizaje en primer lugar y ha asegurado a Idira que la traerá cuando el momento sea adecuado.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, iniş bölgesini önce kendisi keşfetmeye karar verdi ve doğru zaman geldiğinde İdira'yı yanına alacağına ikna etti.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain has decided to explore the landing site first and assured Idira that {mf|he|she} will take her with {mf|him|her} when the time is right.
